info.name: Nguyễn Huỳnh Lợi
others: Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh, VN

contents: Currently I'm an undergraduate at the [UIT](https://en.uit.edu.vn/). I'm grinding and persuing frontend technologies and am quite active on [Github](https://github.com/loia5tqd001). I used to aggressively active on [**Stackoverflow**](https://stackoverflow.com/users/9787887) as well, ranked among the top 15% of users with frontend-related tags.
*Willing to learn: Nodejs, Typescript, Puppeteer, CI/CD,...*

[Live Demo](https://nostalgic-lichterman-4cf223.netlify.com/watching)

body: Summary: Wireframe, redesign, high-fidelity mockup and prototype some pages of the Netflix site.

heading: Game Captain America and The Avengers NES remake
[Video Demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=opvoS4-yUgg)
[Github](https://github.com/loia5tqd001/SE102-UIT-Game-Captain-America-and-The-Avengers)
[Release](https://github.com/loia5tqd001/SE102-UIT-Game-Captain-America-and-The-Avengers/releases)
body: Role: Developer, Technical Architect and Leader (of team 3 people)
Summary: Clone 4 stages of the game *Captain America and The Avengers NES* with the restriction of not using any third-party engine nor framework, but plain C++ and DirectX

Facts: Effectively collaborated by 3 team members, the team was super productive. This was the best project in one of (if not) **the toughest classes in the UIT**, being done blazingly fast, with super high quality. It's far superior than the runner-up teams, and far superior over what the subject expected. **My proudest project** so far.

heading: Web Learning Journey

Summary: Repository contains tons of small to medium-sized practice projects on the web related
